LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.PsychicP: Enabling this will make psykers who are experiencing mental breakdowns create a psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.PsykerPa: Enabling this will allow children to be rarely and randomly born as psykers and pariahs.
Chance that newly born children will either be a psyker or pariah: {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.Perpetua: Enabling this will allow children to be rarely and randomly born as perpetuals.
Chance that newly born children will be a perpetual: {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.UseChaos: Use chaos version of the banner for the chapter ancient ability.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.LivingSa: Chances for a Living Saint to resurrect
Enabling this will allow colonist being killed to resurrect as Living Saints.
Living Saints base chance: {0}% (other modifiers may increase beyond this)
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ModSettings.PsychicC: Enabling this will cause pawn to slowly lose consciousness while create superhuman matrices. \nIf royalty is installed and the pawn is psychic, they will lose psyfocus first.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.Gestate: {0} has been gestated into {1} and can now be implanted into a suitable pawn
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.SelectX: Select {0} material from among your available materials, if you have any
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.EjectGe: Ejects {0} from the gene gestator, allowing you to insert another
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.StartGe: Starts the gestating process, once started it cannot be stopped
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.SelectM: Select matrix to gestate from among your matrices
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneGestator.Missing: You have not researched any gestatable genetic matrices projects
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.PrimarchGrowthVat.St: Starts the primarch growth process, once started it cannot be stopped
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.PrimarchGrowthVat.Pr: Are you sure you want to start this process?\n\nYou cannot stop this machine once started, and destruction of it will lead to loss of embryo.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneManupulationTabl: {0} is not skilled enough to craft a primarch embryo, needs {1}
Select gene-seed vial and human embryo for creation of a primarch embryo
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Containers.Deteriora: Will deteriorate due to being outside suitable container.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Containers.Sangprimu: Click for more info on this gene.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Decorations.EditFlag: Edit the color and insignia of the banner.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.ThunderWarrior.Chanc: {0}% chance to go berserk within half a day.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.NoProgen: Does not have any progenoid glands
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.SMGenese: Space Marine gene-seed extraction not researched
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.PMGenese: Primaris Marine gene-seed extraction not researched
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.Progreno: {0}'s gene-seeds are ready to be harvested.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.SpaceMarine.FirstGen: Gene-seeds can be harvested in {0} days{1}.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.LivingSaint.LivingSa: In {0}'s final moments they felt a surge of energy surging through them, invigorating and strengthening them. {0} was born anew as a living saint, stronger, faster and evermore loyal.
Though thought dead, {0}'s miracles keeps coming. It seem {0} sensed our situation from their afterlife and manifested themselves to help
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Perpetual.PerpetualR: Though thought dead, it seem that {0} has regenerated even their most dire wounds
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.LorgarDivina: {0} is not part of any ideology
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.ChillgronAbi: {0} is not in mental state or have any negative thoughts or memories
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.TwinConnecte: Twin is on a different map
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.DeniedWitch: {0} psychic powers have been severed (Deny the Witch)
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.PawnDoesNotH: {0} does not have the {1} gene which is required to control this mech
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.PawnCannotCo: {0} cannot control anymore {1} mechs, limit is {2}
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.WillNotSummo: Will not summon any {0} as limit has been reached
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.ProofOfFaith: Will give {1} Grace and induce {0_labelShort} with coma for {2} days.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.NoDivineGrac: {0_labelShort} does not have enough divine Grace.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.StasisResear: {0} is about to enter stasis. You have not researched {1} and will have a hard time resurrecting {0} from stasis. \n\nUse with caution!
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.MustBeDowned: {0} is not downed or in bed.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Ability.MustHaveIdeo: {0} must be part of an ideology.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneseedVial.Implant: You are about to implant {0}, making them into a {1}
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneseedVial.Outside: {0} being outside the optimal age range {1}~{2} for this procedure
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneseedVial.Current: Current failure chance is {0}%, failure will result in death and loss of gene-seed vial. This fail chance is a second check after a succesfull surgery.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.GeneseedVial.Failure: Current failure chance is caused by:
Procedure failure chance was capped at {0}%
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.Annihilation: A psychic blast surged through {0} and into the world, causing a warp explosion completely annihilating {0} and severely damaging everything around them.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.DaemonHost: A strong link was established between {0} and one of the chaos gods, allowing them to send in some daemons.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.Uncontrollable: In a temporary loss of control over their powers, {0} caused a warp explosion, causing damage to everyone near them.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.PsychicComa: Overwhelmed by the warp made {0} fall into a psychic coma.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.PsychicConnect: In an instant {0} no longer felt any connection to the warp, as if completely cut off.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.BloodRain: As if a cruel joke, blood suddenly starts raining.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.PlantRot: All plant life seems to rot in {0} presence, leaving it lifeless.
LanguageData.BEWH.MankindsFinest.Event.NaturalBornXMe: From the moment {1} was conceived something felt off, something that has finally come to light. It seems that {1} has been born as a {2}.
